meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>emit</kanji>ted <kanji>energy</kanji> of some machine is <vocabulary>exhaust</vocabulary>. This can also refer to <vocabulary>ventilation</vocabulary>. Think of it as air (energy) being emitted so new, fresh air can take its place!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
